snippet.title: Kona II: Brume - Announcement Teaser
snippet.description: A bizarre mist - the Brume - is disconnecting a rural mining village from its quiet reality and disrupting the balance of nature. But where is it coming from? Kona II: Brume, the upcoming single-player first-person narrative-adventure game and sequel to the celebrated Kona – both developed by Parabole and published by Ravenscourt – will immerse players directly into Detective Carl Faubert’s investigation. Kona II: Brume is planned to release in 2023 on PlayStation® 4, PlayStation® 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch and PC.
